about_me.des: An Enthusiast who wants to break into Cybersecurity

projects.blackarch-zsh: A Docker contenerized blackarch edition, with tweaks in shell and overall experience. With all tools that I'm using pre-installed with non-root user set up
projects.worldwide-list: A Curated List of ITSec Specialists. It promotes sharing your research/knowledge in your native-speaking language. Also, it is for language learners, who would want to immerse themselves even more. CONTRIBUTION IS NEEDED AND APPRECIATED! <3
projects.bug-bounty-framework: An Automation project to various Bug Bounty Hunting methodologies.The script also converts all of the results into Markdown document, giving you organised 'research' environment.

career.nextcode_des: Now I am in Nextcode and develop website with Python code for genetic analysis.
career.netease_des: In Netease game, I learned game service system and use Python code for ops.
career.ucloud_des: In ucloud, I started to deal with servers and Linux system and use shell scripts to manage massive server.
career.college_des: At July 2013,I graduated from college and started my IT technology tour.
